extendedInfo.description: The #1 FREE Android virtual world "Story" series returns with Restaurant Story! Design your own dream restaurant to show off to your friends. Don't forget to make sure your customers are happy and well-fed by choosing stunning decoration and tasty new dishes! New content will be released EVERY WEEK so the game continually gets even better!- Design and build a unique cafe with stunning variety and creativity.- Customize and choose a top-class menu to suit your tastes.- Showcase your cafe and earn extra-special tips from friends.- Invite your Facebook friends to be your neighbors.- Exchange secret recipes with your friends.- Simple and easy-to-use tap interface.- Hundred of dish selections from Creme Brulee to Fish and Chips.- FREE updates with new dishes, decorations, themes and more EVERY WEEK!- It's FREE!PLEASE NOTE:- This is an online game only.TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android, iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad.Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available atÂ www.teamlava.com/termsÂ andÂ www.teamlava.com/privacyPlease note that Restaurant Story is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use PIN for purchase. Then, set up the four-digit PIN on the option below. In addition, Restaurant Story may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

reviews.title: Restuarant Story
reviews.comment: this game works great ! Much better than before!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun though Bakery story is cuter.
reviews.comment: Playing for over 2 years. Super fun and cute. Love getting special items and decorating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this game,  it\'s cool & I think it\'s better Than all the other ones, really fun & it\'s my type of games. very Addicing
reviews.author: Babiie Rodriguez

reviews.title: Good Game But Could Be Better
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game, but... It would be nice if the creator/administrators of the game can kindly: 1. Give gamers more/extra coins and gems for completing goals and expanding their restaurants 2. Give gamers the option to buy and put as much items (ie. Stove, oven, etc.) in their restaurants as they want/like 3. Give more options on timing of making foods - shorter times (1 min, 2 mins, 3 mins, etc.)  Thank you.
reviews.author: Adina N

reviews.title: could not play on s4
reviews.comment: cool game if only i could play it on my new phone but when instulling, keeps on not recognizing me and have to start from scretch. Euen if i aninstulled from my older device.. milgiov
reviews.author: Meilena Casingena Zahra

reviews.title: Electronics
reviews.comment: I love this game, but I need to be able to buy more stoves, ovens, grills when I want. Instead of waiting for 3 levels.
reviews.author: Francinia Barlatier

reviews.title: Fix issues
reviews.comment: Goals are not set by level so past goals can\'t be unlocked but yet are kept in list. Allow new players to have goals from previous months this needs fixing. (3 stars) .. Support not very good they havent helped me yet. Keep getting skipped to have my question answered.(2 stars) i will rate 5 after there is progress on these issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Luv this game, bt recently iv nt been getin my alerts wen someone leaves a msg on my wall, n yes b4 u ask, it is switched on in the option menu. Pls fix this as i dnt wana have to uninstal n start agen :(
reviews.author: Richard Alvis

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Slow game.  Almost not fun because you can barely play without wanting to buy gems
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!!
reviews.comment: Quick, entertaining fast paced environment! Really good game
reviews.author: Ami Keller

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: Where do I start? Well you can\'t take off the door to make time to rack up on food. They eat it all before you can even finish cooking other meals. You can\'t get more than 3 stoves before level 10 but can have 8 counters. What I can\'t understand the most is why if I cook the same meal it doesn\'t add to the exact same meal already prepared?! It takes up space on another counter that can have room for another meal. Makes no sense smh If these things were available I\'ll give it a 5 : D
reviews.author: Britt J

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Pretty good game,needs more missions besides downloading different versions for different holidays. Its a lil hard to get ppl to send u the supplies u need to build stoves. Fun to design ur own place
reviews.author: Vicente Cervantes

reviews.comment: Plz add don_04  Dats mah nefew and hes lOOkin fOr neighbors !  Thank yuh
reviews.author: Jamie Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Love this game, one question. How do you transfer everything when you buy a new phone? Please help someone!
reviews.author: James Wood

reviews.comment: Excellent game you can cook different recepies in a certain time period and gain money.\tJust love it. Want neighbour add me my I\'d anamika21
reviews.author: Arpita ghoshal

reviews.title: Not Pleased
reviews.comment: Not happy, I clicked on one of those mystery boxes to see info, and it bought it for 24(!) Gems, with no \'are you sure you want to buy this?\' Page.1*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: =D
reviews.author: amanda houchin

reviews.title: I
reviews.comment: Been playing this game for the longest  Ialso love how u guy give free gems away very good idea I would recommend this game to all my friends :-)
reviews.author: Nana Fox

reviews.title: More levels.
reviews.comment: The game should go past level 99. All my neighbors are level 99 too. Would be great to have more to see how long some have been playing. Still love RS after almost two years!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: When I tip restaurants and collect the stars my star rating remains the same. I should be on 3 or 4 by now but I\'m stuck on 2. Everytime I collect one the bar goes up but back down and remains there. Please fix this problem.   My restaurant is also always out of sync. Please fix.
reviews.author: Nakayla Williams
